Next person to flame in this topic is banned for one week.
[/quote] Thank you… It’s useless flaming, I posted the fact that I extracted it from the game, and why flame at all ? It’s a model for a game. No one has posted it before, so why shouldn’t I?

Welcome to mopar, we’re known in this section for pointless flame, this topic is a living example. (No offence to those of us who are able to control ourselves.

And Rip is right, backlight is terrible. makes it look like your trying to hide something[/quote] Mm, lemme see… I uploaded the model, what is there to hide ? btw, it’s offense.

item.title: Halo 1 pistol
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Haha alright, no more flame
But I was serious. I hate people who rip others’ models. I know its Bungie and nobody on the forums had made or posted them before, but I’m tired of it, ok?
Don’t aggravate me moar pl0x.
Also, NEVER use the backlight setting, you can’t see most of the details in the model.

Read full topic
